import React, { useState } from 'react' import {AiOutlineEye,AiOutlineEyeInvisible} from "react-icons/ai" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const LoginForm = () => { const [formData,setFormData]=useState({ email:'', password:'' }) const [showPassword,setShowPassword]= useState(false); function changeHandler(event){ setFormData((prev)=>({...prev, [event.target.name]:event.target.value })) } return (
) } export default LoginForm
